resources.string: Well done, that is a strong password!
The password is weak. C\'mon, you can do better
The password is in a dictionary
According to the password meter, this is weak.
You can follow this technique to create simple but strong passwords:
Now that you can create strong passwords, follow these advices to protect them:
Connect to your Twitter account to create a personalized attack dictionary.\n\n The analysis will use this information to find weaknesses in you passwords just like a motivated hacker would do.
Current contents of your Personal Attack Dictionary.
The password contains a word in a dictionary.
You have used a word in your personal attack dictionary
